title: The Banshee and Her Lovers
description: Cl√≠ona thought she would spend Halloween alone, a third wheel, with no mates of her own... She was sorely mistaken.She had not one, not two, but three mates! A vampire, a werewolf, and an incubus, and all three want to take her to the Halloween Ball.But her magic goes awry, throwing everything into chaos, shifting into a curse, and causing her mates to disappear.She'll have to pay the ultimate price if she wants to get them back... But she only has until day's end to break the curse... and all Hallows Eve is quickly drawing closer.***A RH story*** ***18+*** ***Adult Content***
author: Kindra White
